attributes.action: Force convicted criminals to work repairing roads and cleaning graffiti to cover their cost of inprisonment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make convicted criminals work repairing roads and cleaning buildings of graffiti to cover the cost of their inprisonment.

It is time we ended the soft touch we give to convicted criminals. Often we hear of one enjoying a life of bliss that the average person cannot enjoy. A bed, a TV, a games console, full library at their disposal and learning opportunities to gain qualifications that we must pay for on the outside!

Allow for "over-time" to earn rental time for luxury items such as Television for a night.
Limited used books only for entertainment if no over-time.

Bring back the punishment in incarceration rather than a holiday. Stop us paying for their holiday. Make them work for their keep.
